channel.description: Recent content in central-equilibrium on Dan Kleiman

item.title: New Course: Introduction to Rooting and Stability
item.description: If you listed to the recent Qigong Radio episode on Rooting, Central Equilibrium, and Balance, you probably want more insight into how to put Tai Chi balance training to work in your practice. Now you can start Tai Chi balance training with our new eBook, "An Introduction to Rooting and Stability," where you will take the Tai Chi Way to re-gaining, one of life's simplest yet most essential treasures--the gift of balance.
